sect1.title: Usage
sect1.para: The source function executes the contents of the given filename one line at a time (as if it had been typed at the > prompt). The source function syntax is source(filename) where filename is a string containing the name of the file to process.

sect1.title: Example
sect1.para: First, we write some commands to a file (note that it does not end in the usual .m extension):
Now we source the resulting file.

para.verbatim: --> clear a b --> source source_test a is 32 and b is 32
